name: Escape Room 3D (Alpha)
description:
Escape room 3D is a new and fresh approach for digital escape room games on the browser. It provides an imersive experience by using 3D graphics with first person controls.  (Requires modern Chrome/Edge browsers that support the most recent version of WebGL)

For now, there is only one room available just to explore the concept, but in the future, more rooms/challenges will be added with different themes other than the office theme
